Portal was game unlike any other. It had a condescending super computer who happened to have an obsession with cake, super colliding super buttons, Layman's terms and momentum. It had small and simple yet brilliantly created puzzles. It had Still Alive and it had a perfect completion time of 45 minutes - 2 hours. Fast foward to 2016 and it retains all these values, the graphics still hold up to today's standards, the voice acting is amazing, levels are brilliant, GLaDOS is still wants to kill you as always and the companion cube is still a favourite of many.

To anyone who hasn't completed Portal yet, I simply ask you TO DO IT NOW!

Das Game der Götter sagen Fanatiker wie ich, und wir haben recht! Portale, Schussanlagen und künstliche Intelligenz sind hier am Start, und zwar genügend für Alle. Absolutes Must-Have, und holt euch den zweiten Teil!
Geniales Spiel damals wie auch heute
Excelente game, toda a atmosfera de Half Life mas numa mecânica diferente e desafiadora, super recomendado!

Efsane serinin başlangıç oyunu demek isterdim ama zaten her oyundan 2 tane yapmakta usta olan valve bunu da 2 tane yaptı bıraktı. Keske devam etse demek istediğim naçizane bir oyun Portal 2 de devamında tekrar tekrar bitirmek istediğim unuttukça tekrar oynadığım oyunlardan. 3 boyutlu düşünmeye ve problem çözme sitematiğini bu kadar net ama karmaşıklaştıran başka bir oyun daha oynamadım üstüne üstlük hikayesi de ayrı bir içine alan türden.

Sencillo con unos puzzles asequibles para cualquier persona intuitivo y tiene uno de los mejores jefes de los juegos.
Se avete amato Half Life, allora non potete lasciarvi sfuggire Portal e il suo seguito Portal 2. Giochi che definire innovativi è a dir poco riduttivo.
One of a kind - nuff said!

Se non avete voglia di impegnarvi non solo per risolvere intelligenti e coinvolgenti enigmi, ma anche di scavarae a fondo questo gioco per godere di una delle trame più belle di sempre, statene alla larga.
Enigmi di altissima qualità, trama eccellente, colonna sonora bellissima in grado di dare una marcia in più ad ogni scena. Il gameplay è estremamente divertente e il senso di soddisfazione dato dal risolvere un enigma è impagabile.
Consigliatissimo.

9.5/10.

You love games wich are made full with love and brain? U are bored of "I go in and kill everything"? Portal is the perfect game for you, when u like to think and then play. I just can say, portal is one of the best, maybe even the best game I have ever played, and defenitly worth for the full price and totally worth for the reduced price, even when its just a get trough play time of 2 hours.

ずっと積んでいましたがやっと最近プレイしたのでレビュー。

最初にポータルガンを使ったときに思ったことは、「VALVEってすげぇな・・・。」ですｗ
耳タコなぐらい前評判を聞いた上でのプレイでしたが、期待以上の楽しさでした。
ポータルガンってプレイ動画みるだけでは分からないですね。こればっかりは体験しないと。

そしてポータルガンを使ったただのアクションパズルだと最初は思っていたので、
ストーリーがあることにも驚きました。
特にキャラクターが素晴らしい！まぁ[spoiler] １名（１体？）[/spoiler]だけですがｗ
愛すべきキャラクターですね。
エンディングテーマがすっごい良かった。何回も聞きましたｗ

２はまだプレイしてないですが、ストーリーが続くようなので今から期待しています。

Amazing gaming experience that I have ever been through. You just never know for sure how you would pass a certain checkpoint, not to mention the process of finding the solution, is it momentum, or something hidden somewhere that you haven't found yet? And how do those mechanical devices help you get through? Everlastingly new engine SOURCE has never met its limit, making the game itself nothing to be criticized. ALL IN ALL, RECOMMEND GREATLY!!!
[spoiler]hahahahaha the end of the game is also TERRIFIC!!![/spoiler]

One of the best puzzle games there is, featuring one of the most interesting villains of all times. You will not be bored at any time in the whole playthrough.
Unlike anything to have come before it, Portal combined brain-stimulating puzzle-solving with dry humor and an intense cyberpunk plot. The experience is like no other and worth any sci-fi fan's time.
good game

Genial. Psyics sind großartig, Story ist verwirrend und witzig, "GlaDOS" die einen durch das Spiel führt ist böse und charmant zu gleich, die Rätsel machen Spaß, für die, die es zu einfach finden gibt es danach noch mal alle Rätsel als Challenge in schwerer.
Einziger Makel, das Spiel ist zu kurz, aber dafür gibt es ja Portal 2.

The Cake is a Lie!

This game has got a huge amount of exposure. It's been heralded as the greatest game of all time, the funniest game ever, the best four hours of your life...

It is all of those. 9 years of age cannot change a thing. This game is pretty. This game is clever. This game is hilarious. And this game, most of all, captures the very essence of
FUN.

It's well worth your four hours and four pounds. If you think it's been ruined by memes, you are wrong. Play the game, you'll be glad you did.



Also it has the best villain ever GLaDOS is best waifu.
